radiographic_examinations.findings: Extensive acellular eosinophilic material staining strongly positive with Congo red; moderate tubular atrophy, interstitial fibrosis, and arteriosclerosis; negative for IgG, IgA, k, and l on immunofluorescence.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Serum creatinine increased from 2.4 mg/dl to 2.8 mg/dl over two months, prompting the biopsy.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Detected amyloid in the gastric, duodenal, and rectal mucosa.
Moderate to severe concentric increase in left ventricular wall thickness; left ventricular ejection fraction of 68%; systolic left ventricular cavity obliteration during Valsalva maneuver.
Sinus rhythm, normal voltage QRS complexes, no Q waves; t-wave inversion in leads I and aVL.
Did not detect myocardium tracer uptake.
Not performed due to renal failure.
